## ExtensionManager.extensionData() method

Collect data from all the extensions. This will be made available to the consuming react component within the context data and also the child renderProp function parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
extensionData(): Record<string, PlainObject>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Record<string, PlainObject>`
